headline: Uber launches in Barbados, a new way for travelers to move around the island
summary: Travelers visiting Barbados can now explore the island more easily with the Uber app. Uber is officially available across Barbados, marking the company's first launch in the Eastern Caribbean. With just a few taps, visitors can request a ride through Uber Taxi, connecting them with the island's licensed taxi drivers.

headline: Uber started offering rickshaw rides (yes, really)
summary: Used to describe a light two-wheeled cart pulled or pedaled by a person at the front, the term "rickshaw" dates back to the 19th century and is commonly associated with Asian countries like Thailand and India. This is despite the fact that visitors to New York City can also book tours on similar ...

headline: Kroger and Uber Eats Announce Expanded Relationship to Provide More Access, Rewards, and Choice for Customers Nationwide
summary: Today, Uber Technologies, Inc. (NYSE: UBER) and The Kroger Co. (NYSE: KR) announced an expanded relationship that brings together Kroger's Family of Companies and Uber Eats' leading delivery platform to make it easier than ever for customers to shop, save, and dine—all in one place.

headline: WeRide (WRD) Is Up 12.9% After Launching Uber Robotaxis and Announcing Hong Kong Equity Offering
summary: Uber Technologies recently announced the launch of autonomous robotaxi rides with WeRide in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, marking the country's first public deployment of driverless vehicles on the Uber platform, while WeRide initiated a follow-on equity offering in Hong Kong aiming to raise HK$3.09 billion. This collaboration brings together regulatory approval, a major market entry in the Middle East, and strong backing from high-profile partners as WeRide pursues expansion and commercialization...
